ellipse.style: fill: rgb(205, 56, 56); fill-opacity: 0.3; fill-rule: nonzero; isolation: isolate; transform-origin: 298.288px 212.019px;

path.style: stroke: rgb(205, 56, 56); stroke-width: 60px; transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%; stroke-linecap: round; fill-opacity: 0.3; fill: none;
